title: TOMORROW X TOGETHER’s 2025 US Tour: How to Get Tickets
description: TXT will support their new album, The Star Chapter: TOGETHER, with nine concerts in the US this fall. Learn how to get tickets here. TOMORROW X TOGETHER’s 2025 US Tour: How to Get Tickets Paolo Ragusa
author: Paolo Ragusa
excerpt: TOMORROW X TOGETHER have detailed a new US tour taking place in fall 2025. Learn how to get tickets here.
text: K-pop superstars TOMORROW X TOGETHER have announced their fourth world tour, “TOMORROW X TOGETHER WORLD TOUR <ACT : TOMORROW>.” The US leg features nine shows across seven cities in September and October 2025, supporting their upcoming album The Star Chapter: TOGETHER. Get TOMORROW X TOGETHER Tickets Here Find details on the tour below, and get tickets to sold-out shows here. How Can I Get Tickets to TOMORROW X TOGETHER’s 2025 Tour — Even If The Shows Are Sold Out? Tickets for TOMORROW X TOGETHER’s 2025 “ACT : TOMORROW” tour are now on sale via Ticketmaster. Fans can also look for deals or get last-minute tickets to sold-out shows via StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand. TOMORROW X TOGETHER’s “ACT : TOMORROW” serves as the quintet’s fourth world tour and follows the band’s previous US outing in summer 2024. The group — consisting of Soobin, Yeonjun, Beomgyu, Taehyun, and Hueningkai — will launch the new tour at Seoul’s Gocheok Sky Dome on August 22 and 23 before heading to the US. The tour title encapsulates the message of moving forward together toward a promised tomorrow, aligning with their upcoming album The Star Chapter: TOGETHER, due July 21st. The “ACT : TOMORROW” tour will commence in the US at San Jose’s SAP Center on September 9th, followed by a return to Los Angeles’ BMO Stadium. The tour will then visit Dallas, Rosemont (with two nights), Atlanta, Washington D.C., and conclude with two nights in Newark, New Jersey, on October 1st and 2nd. See their full list of tour dates below. Do TOMORROW X TOGETHER Have a New Album Coming Out? Yes! TOMORROW X TOGETHER will release their 4th Studio Album The Star Chapter: TOGETHER on July 21st. The album delves into the true meaning of ‘togetherness,’ telling the story of youths who save ‘you’ and the world through the act of calling out each other’s names. This new release serves as the inspiration behind their “ACT : TOMORROW” tour, with fans expecting to hear fresh material alongside their beloved hits during the live shows. Revisit Consequence’s 2023 cover story on TOMORROW X TOGETHER, and pick up a collector’s box set on sale for $65 off at Consequence Shop. Who Is Opening for TOMORROW X TOGETHER on Their 2025 Tour? No opener has been confirmed yet for TOMORROW X TOGETHER’s “ACT : TOMORROW” tour. Given the scale of their production and the length of their typical setlists, it’s likely the tour will feature TXT as the sole act. What Are TOMORROW X TOGETHER’s 2025 Tour Dates? Grab tickets to see TOMORROW X TOGETHER live on stage here. TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2025 “ACT : TOMORROW” US Tour Dates: 09/09 — San Jose, CA @ SAP Center at San Jose 09/12 — Los Angeles, CA @ BMO Stadium 09/16 — Dallas, TX @ American Airlines Center 09/21 — Rosemont, IL @ Allstate Arena 09/22 — Rosemont, IL @ Allstate Arena 09/25 — Atlanta, GA @ State Farm Arena 09/28 — Washington, DC @ Capital One Arena 10/01 — Newark, NJ @ Prudential Center 10/02 — Newark, NJ @ Prudential Center
html:
K-pop superstars TOMORROW X TOGETHER have announced their fourth world tour, “TOMORROW X TOGETHER WORLD TOUR <ACT : TOMORROW>.” The US leg features nine shows across seven cities in September and October 2025, supporting their upcoming album The Star Chapter: TOGETHER.

Get TOMORROW X TOGETHER Tickets Here

Find details on the tour below, and get tickets to sold-out shows here.

How Can I Get Tickets to TOMORROW X TOGETHER’s 2025 Tour — Even If The Shows Are Sold Out?

Tickets for TOMORROW X TOGETHER’s 2025 “ACT : TOMORROW” tour are now on sale via Ticketmaster. Fans can also look for deals or get last-minute tickets to sold-out shows via StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand.

TOMORROW X TOGETHER’s “ACT : TOMORROW” serves as the quintet’s fourth world tour and follows the band’s previous US outing in summer 2024. The group — consisting of Soobin, Yeonjun, Beomgyu, Taehyun, and Hueningkai — will launch the new tour at Seoul’s Gocheok Sky Dome on August 22 and 23 before heading to the US. The tour title encapsulates the message of moving forward together toward a promised tomorrow, aligning with their upcoming album The Star Chapter: TOGETHER, due July 21st.

The “ACT : TOMORROW” tour will commence in the US at San Jose’s SAP Center on September 9th, followed by a return to Los Angeles’ BMO Stadium. The tour will then visit Dallas, Rosemont (with two nights), Atlanta, Washington D.C., and conclude with two nights in Newark, New Jersey, on October 1st and 2nd. See their full list of tour dates below.

Do TOMORROW X TOGETHER Have a New Album Coming Out?

Yes! TOMORROW X TOGETHER will release their 4th Studio Album The Star Chapter: TOGETHER on July 21st. The album delves into the true meaning of ‘togetherness,’ telling the story of youths who save ‘you’ and the world through the act of calling out each other’s names. This new release serves as the inspiration behind their “ACT : TOMORROW” tour, with fans expecting to hear fresh material alongside their beloved hits during the live shows.

Revisit Consequence’s 2023 cover story on TOMORROW X TOGETHER, and pick up a collector’s box set on sale for $65 off at Consequence Shop.

Who Is Opening for TOMORROW X TOGETHER on Their 2025 Tour?

No opener has been confirmed yet for TOMORROW X TOGETHER’s “ACT : TOMORROW” tour. Given the scale of their production and the length of their typical setlists, it’s likely the tour will feature TXT as the sole act.

What Are TOMORROW X TOGETHER’s 2025 Tour Dates?

Grab tickets to see TOMORROW X TOGETHER live on stage here.

TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2025 “ACT : TOMORROW” US Tour Dates:

09/09 — San Jose, CA @ SAP Center at San Jose
09/12 — Los Angeles, CA @ BMO Stadium
09/16 — Dallas, TX @ American Airlines Center
09/21 — Rosemont, IL @ Allstate Arena
09/22 — Rosemont, IL @ Allstate Arena
09/25 — Atlanta, GA @ State Farm Arena
09/28 — Washington, DC @ Capital One Arena
10/01 — Newark, NJ @ Prudential Center
10/02 — Newark, NJ @ Prudential Center
